PathOfBuilding.Notes:
For early leveling you can use the vendor recipe for weapons:
You need ^x8888FFMagic^7 Sceptre/Wand/Rune Dagger
^xB97123Ruby^7 ring ^7Normal ring^7 - tier 8 damage mod - level requirement 8 ^x8888FF Magic^7 ring - tier 7 damage mod - level requirement 14 ^xFFFF77 Rare^7 ring - tier 6 damage mod - level requirement 20
Lastly ^x8888FFOrb of Alteration ^7
You will vendor this items and you get a wepaon with added ^xE05030Fire^7 Damage to Spells.
Im leveled with explosive trap little bit slow in the early level because we cant use cluster traps but instead you can use multiple traps for increase our clear speed. (level8)
If you have a hard time with the damage take ^xFFFF77damage^7 nodes if you have problem with survival take ^xE05030life^7 nodes. This is how im playing.
